perturbation.original_text: c. Exhibit B sets forth the pricing and rates for Preferred Services [***]. The prices and rates set forth in Exhibit B and the Discount and Booking thresholds set forth in Exhibit C shall remain in effect, without adjustment, during the Initial Term of this Agreement and may thereafter be updated to reflect changes in connection with any Renewal of this Agreement, as specified in Section 1 herein.
perturbation.changed_text: c. The prices and rates for Preferred Services will be determined on a case-by-case basis. The Discount and Booking thresholds set forth in Exhibit C shall remain in effect, without adjustment, during the Initial Term of this Agreement and may thereafter be updated to reflect changes in connection with any Renewal of this Agreement, as specified in Section 1 herein.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Exhibit B as the source for 'pricing and rates', but still referencing it for 'Discount and Booking thresholds' and not providing an alternative source, there is now an ambiguity as to how preferred service prices are determined. This creates uncertainty and contradiction in the agreement, making it difficult to enforce.

perturbation.original_text:
The parties' ownership rights in any inventions, patents, trademarks, copyrights, software, methodologies, writings and other property in any form whatsoever that results out of the development of a Joint Solution shall be addressed by the parties by separate written agreement which may include, an applicable Work Order and/or an amendment to this Agreement ("Intellectual Property Amendment") .

Unless otherwise addressed in an Intellectual Property Amendment, VS hereby assigns to PPD (or Sponsor as the case may be) all rights that VS may have in any invention, technology, know-how or other intellectual property which is developed with use of Confidential Information provided to VS by PPD. Additionally, VS shall assist PPD (or Sponsor), at PPD's (or Sponsor's) sole cost and expense, in obtaining or extending protection therefor.
perturbation.changed_text:
The parties' ownership rights in any inventions, patents, trademarks, copyrights, software, methodologies, writings and other property in any form whatsoever that results out of the development of a Joint Solution shall be determined on a case-by-case basis. 

Unless otherwise addressed in an Intellectual Property Amendment, VS hereby assigns to PPD (or Sponsor as the case may be) all rights that VS may have in any invention, technology, know-how or other intellectual property which is developed with use of Confidential Information provided to VS by PPD. Additionally, VS shall assist PPD (or Sponsor), at PPD's (or Sponsor's) sole cost and expense, in obtaining or extending protection therefor.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the initial agreement to use a 'separate written agreement' to define IP rights related to a Joint Solution, and instead stating it will be 'determined on a case-by-case basis', the contract introduces ambiguity and contradiction. The subsequent paragraph still refers to Intellectual Property Amendment, implying a specific process is in place, but the removed text eliminated such process. This creates conflict on how IP is assigned.

perturbation.original_text:
VS shall cooperate with any internal reviews or audits by PPD or Sponsor (or its and their representatives) and shall make available for examination and duplication, during normal business hours and at mutually agreeable times, all documentation, data and information relating to this Agreement or any Work Order.

Further, VS shall inform PPD within one (1) business day of being notified of an audit by any regulatory authority or by any Sponsor to the extent such audit relates to the Preferred Services, the Joint Solution or a Work Order hereunder. PPD or its representatives shall be permitted to be present at and directly communicate with such regulatory authority or Sponsor representatives (as the case may be) concerning any matters related to the Preferred Services, the Joint Solution or a Work Order hereunder arising in connection with such audit.
perturbation.changed_text:
VS shall cooperate with any internal reviews or audits by PPD or Sponsor (or its and their representatives) and shall make available for examination and duplication, during normal business hours and at mutually agreeable times, all documentation, data and information relating to this Agreement or any Work Order.

Further, VS shall inform PPD as soon as reasonably possible if notified of an audit by any Sponsor to the extent such audit relates to a Work Order hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'regulatory authority' from this clause, VS is no longer required to inform PPD of audits by any regulatory authority. However, section 8 states that VS shall comply with all applicable laws, rules, regulations and guidelines. This creates an inconsistency and impacts auditing requirements
